entry.title: XLube - Powder Lubricant
entry.summary:
Vendor: XLube Online Store
Type:
Price: 28.95

- XLube powder-granulates, dissolve easily in water producing a clear gel
- Easy to mix, easy to clean, very economical - one bottle makes 20+ litres
- Extremely long lasting, cushioning lubricant with a natural feel
- Free of sugars, additives, fillers - no odours or any tastes
- MADE IN GERMANY - certified as non-cytotoxic (ISO10993-5)

XLube is a 100% pure, rapidly water-soluble powder for making a smooth lubricant without any lumps. It mixes to a clear natural-feel gel without any taste or odour. It is extremely economical, long-lasting and safe to use. XLube contains no sugars, fats, fillers or preservatives.

One 100gr bottle of XLube powder makes 20+ litres of odourless lubricant. Simply add the powder to water in a typical sports bottle, shake well, wait a short time, shake again and you're done. Mixing suggestions (in multiple languages) are included with each bottle together with an XLube Fan-Sticker.

XLube does not stain and washes out of clothes, bedding and towels without leaving any residue. 



Contents:
1x XLube (100gr bottle)
1x mixing suggestion leaflet (how to mix)
1x fan sticker
